Here you will find examples of the various ways that Sharecare combines Magnolia CMS and Spring Framework.  Examples include:

  • Spring MVC invoking Magnolia views
  • Spring MVC passing database objects to Magnolia views
  • Blossom components merging data from the JCR and an external database
  • Magnolia synchronizing data between the JCR and an external database
  • Seamless interoperation between Spring Security and Magnolia
  • Akamai page-fragment caching using Spring MVC and Blossom

What can I do with this sample?

From here you should:

  • Explore articles on the site: /articles
  • Explore users on the site: /users
  • Click on your username in the top left corner to browse your profile page
  • Go to AdminCentral and explore the page mappings and configuration
